task.title: Annotating Your Document
task.shortdesc: CWRC-Writer provides users with the opportunity to annotate documents. This feature is only available when: the current user has editing priviledges and when the current document is not being edited by someone else.

step.stepresult: The structure tab displays the XML tree and the CWRC-Writer toolbar becomes available for editing. If the document you are trying to edit is locked by someone else you will not be able to switch away from the default view and a warning message will notify you that the document is locked. You will also have the option to request that the other user unlock the document.

step.cmd: Begin to annotate your document by adding person, place, organization (etc.) entities to it.
Click on “Save” or “Save and exit” if you are done annotating your document.
